about_the_game:
It is a downloadable content that enables you to capture the following 3 heroines that you could not capture in "memories (Part 1)".

  • Masaki Minato - cv. Shiori Izawa
  • Mihiro - cv. Ayaka Shimizu
  • ??? - cv.???

By applying this DLC, the target characters will be 6 people together with the first part.

*This game has been decided to be produced with the support of crowdfunding.
Thank you to the patrons!
detailed_description:
It is a downloadable content that enables you to capture the following 3 heroines that you could not capture in "memories (Part 1)".

  • Masaki Minato - cv. Shiori Izawa
  • Mihiro - cv. Ayaka Shimizu
  • ??? - cv.???

By applying this DLC, the target characters will be 6 people together with the first part.

*This game has been decided to be produced with the support of crowdfunding.
Thank you to the patrons!
name: LOST:SMILE promises

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8
  • Processor: Intel Celeron processor N3060
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 400
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core (TM) i7-5500U processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: LOST: SMILE, finally complete. The latter part DLC "LOST: SMILE promises" where three heroines are added to "LOST: SMILE memories" spelled on a remote island in summer.The routes of Minato, Mihiro, and the last heroine that could not be captured in the first part will be added.
